seem to be missing details on a lot of metrics: ACR - Where can I find the "partner influenced ACR" for my account? Did have a great report out of C&AI before, but now this is nowhere to be seen. MW - Where can I find consumption for Windows, OPP, EXO, SPO, etc. We used to have this metric shown on the MWC business review, but now I can only see Team MAU.  Frustrating when we are trying to track progress year over year. I get it that we are focused on different metrics this year (i.e. we get paid on Teams MAU), but honestly, Teams is a */component/* of overall Modern Work consumption, and part of the story. Would be good if we could keep reports at least somewhat consistent from FY to FY ....  Thanks!! brent.

Hi Team,   in the SMB report we see ARPC (currently declining) but we only see Dynamics 365 which is currently including Power Platform revenue. As normally Power Platform projects are smaller in revenue it is hard to get a clear picture about the situation. Can we split Power Platform and Dynamics 365 in the report?

I don't like that we can't manually change when the follow-ups get scheduled in Work Hub. I just had a customer answer my call, they're two days into their M365 trial, and I want to follow up in about a week to give them time to try out the trial. Sales Accelerator still says that the next Follow-Up should be in two days, as if the call went unanswered. And as far as I know there is no way to override that. I can snooze the follow-up, but I would need to make a note as a reminder to snooze it when it pops up in two days.
